description: meta info used by the GPAW parser, all names are expected to start with gpaw_

metaInfos.description: atomic density matrices in the PAW formalism
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_atomic_density_matrices

metaInfos.description: Target value (fixed) of the z projection of the spin moment operator $S^z$ for the converged calculation with the XC_method.
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_fixed_spin_Sz

metaInfos.description: Magnetic moments projected onto atoms. The sum gives the total magnetic moment
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_magnetic_moments

metaInfos.description: number of PAW projector matrix elements in packed format
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_number_of_packed_ap_elements

metaInfos.description: projections in the PAW formalism (imaginary part)
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_projections_imag

metaInfos.description: projections in the PAW formalism (real part)
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_projections_real

metaInfos.description: Value of the z projection of the spin moment operator $S^z$ for the converged calculation with the XC_method.
metaInfos.name: x_gpaw_spin_Sz
